name: Beyond Eldorado
description:
Beyond Eldorado is a single player text adventure from the prolific Lawrence Creighton

The game has a simple storyline, the player is an adventurer who receives a letter from an unspecified 'ancient tribal chief' asking for help to find '|The Golden Key Of Klef'. With that you set off and the game starts at a crossroads somewhere in the world

This game was developed using Quill Adventure System. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well as more unusual commands such as LIND and LUND for LOOK BEHIND and LOOK UNDER
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements

shot.caption: This game guide is shown before the game begins
Is this an easter egg?One of the game's reviewers suggests entering the word 'VIRUS'. It crashes the game in  this manner so don't try it unless the game has been saved
